articles.title: Indianapolis Colts LB Darius Leonard 'feeling amazing' after back surgery; expected to miss start of training camp - ESPN
articles.description: Indianapolis Colts linebacker Darius Leonard says he is "feeling amazing" following back surgery on Tuesday, a procedure which could cause him to miss the start of training camp, according to coach Frank Reich.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS -- Colts All-Pro linebacker Darius Leonard says he is "feeling amazing" following back surgery on Tuesday.
